title: Galaxy S22 Ultra
description: Capture and share every moment Meet Galaxy S22, a smartphone designed for creators who want to capture every moment. It’s packed with next-level innovations you didn’t even know were possible. This is a game-changing device that can create breath-taking low-light videos to make every day - and night - even more epic. But that’s not all. Stay entertained on an incredibly bright Dynamic AMOLED 2X display even in bright sunlight. With more of what you want, you can do more of what you love.

title: iPhone 14 Pro
description: Longest battery life ever. A new Main camera and improved image processing let you capture even more sensational shots in all kinds of light — especially low light. Whether you’re filming while hiking up a rocky trail or chasing your kids through the park, try Action mode for smooth handheld videos. Safety features including emergency SOS via satellite, crash detection call for help when you can't.
